original_text: But they did not listen to me and they did not obey me. They refused to accept the rules that I gave to them. When I warned them, they would not change.” 17: But they did not listen to me and they did not obey me. They refused to accept the rules that I gave to them. When I warned them, they would not change.”
korean_text: 그들은 순종하지 아니하며 귀를 기울이지 아니하며 그 목을 곧게 하여 듣지 아니하며 교훈을 받지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But they did not listen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 내 말을 듣지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and they did not obey me
They refused to accept the rules
